'''Itty Bitty Octobaby''' is an [[gadget]] obtained from the [[Treasures Along the Road: A Thank-You Gift]] event.

Itty Bitty Octobaby is not a true gadget and is merely toggled on when equipped, thus regular gadgets can still be used as per normal. Itty Bitty Octobaby will also temporarily disappear when in combat mode.

==Notes==
* It cannot be used at the same time as any other [[Gadget]] of the "Equipment" type.
